content: Remember this last Christmas when you were out shopping? You were driving through the mega-mall parking lot, looking for a parking space and you finally see someone getting into their car to leave. You patiently wait for them to back out of the spot, but just as you pull forward, some jerk cuts in front of you a takes the spot! You give them a tap of the horn to show your displeasure, but they just casually flip you the bird as they head toward the mall. It’s nice to see a Democrat gun the engine and say “Not today, that’s our spot!”
